Safety: Patient and family screened today for Social Work needs. Safety Concerns Additional Comments: SW received a call from nursing requested assistance with an escalated parent.

SW was informed the patient's mother had become upset earlier in the evening and escalated with staff. Mom was using profanity towards staff and threatened legal action. SW was informed the bedside team made multiple attempts to de-escalate mom. Mom was claim when SW approached to discuss the events of the evening. SW provided supportive listing and offered options to avoid any conflicts with the treatment team. Mom was slightly resistance to these suggestions. SW met with NOL, unit flow nurse, bedside nurse, medical attending, medical fellow and security. The team concluded it would be best for the patient's parents to leave the bedside for the night and return to the unit later today or tomorrow. The patient's parents have been asked to contact the unit and check in with nursing before returning to the hospital. Nursing will contact the on call SW team for assistance if the  needed.
